description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Sour Pork Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet & Sour Pork Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat remaining oil. Add pork and stir fry until golden. Return cooked mixtures to wok. Stir in sauce. Bring to the boil and cook for 3 minutes or until heated through and thickened slightly. Serve stir fry with noodles and top with sesame seeds.
